name: Bryant, Bryant of Bryant
text:
3 "Kingdoms:" monsters
This card can only be Special Summoned by the effect of "Tea Time". This card's effects cannot be negated. If you control 4 "Heavenly Tea Leaf" cards with different names, while this card is in your center Main Monster Zone: Declare "I have won, by the power invested in me by Bryant!" in the public chat;  /kick your opponent. You win the duel. If this card is sent to the GY or Banished: Special Summon 1 "Bryant, Bryant of Bryant" from your Extra Deck, ignoring summoning conditions.
